```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(lubridate)
covid<- readr::read_rds('data/df_covid19.rds')
```

```{r}
covid %>% 
  group_by(estado) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(total_casos = max(casos_acumulado)) %>% 
  dplyr::select(estado,total_casos) %>% 
  dplyr::distinct() %>% 
  plot_ly(x=~estado,y=~total_casos,type = "bar")
```
